characters.name: The Climber
characters.appearance: 19-year-old male, athletic and muscular build (jacked), quarter Asian and 75% white, short-to-medium messy brown hair, clean shaven, wearing a blue athletic shirt, athletic shorts, and sneakers
characters.personality: Thrill-seeking adrenaline junkie, impulsive, can be swayed by peer pressure, defiant when confronted by authority
characters.role: Main protagonist who climbs Duke Chapel after being peer pressured by friends, experiences fear mid-climb but pushes through, and resists arrest at the top

characters.name: Friends
characters.appearance: Group of approximately 40 people at the base of Duke Chapel, background figures
characters.role: Peer pressure the climber and cheer him on from the ground

characters.name: Police Officers
characters.appearance: Law enforcement officers arriving by helicopter
characters.role: Arrive by helicopter to arrest the climber at the top of Duke Chapel

storyline.overview: A 19-year-old thrill-seeker is peer pressured by 40 friends into climbing Duke Chapel. He climbs confidently but experiences a terrifying moment of fear halfway up when he loses his grip momentarily. After recovering with a triumphant fist pump, he reaches the top only to hear helicopters approaching. Police arrive by helicopter and despite his verbal resistance and physical struggling, he is ultimately captured and loaded into the helicopter.
scenes: Opening: 40 friends at the base of Duke Chapel peer pressuring and cheering on the climber
The climb begins: Climber ascends confidently up the chapel walls
Halfway up: Climber loses his grip momentarily in a terrifying slip, creating tension and fear
Moment of triumph: Climber recovers and pumps his fist in victory as he continues upward
Reaching the top: Climber makes it to the summit of Duke Chapel
Helicopter arrival: Climber hears helicopters approaching, police arrive by air
The arrest: Climber verbally resists and physically struggles against officers
Finale: Defiant climber is ultimately captured and loaded into the helicopter
